title: Sounds Definition
description: Validates sound_definitions.json files that define custom sounds for the resource pack. Ensures proper structure and references to audio files.

fields.title: Multiple Definitions
fields.description: Warning when multiple sound_definitions.json files exist. Only one should exist per resource pack in the sounds/ folder.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the additional sound_definitions.json file

fields.title: Invalid Structure
fields.description: Error when sound_definitions.json has an invalid structure. Verify format_version, sound categories, and sound entry formats.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains details about the structural issue

fields.title: Invalid JSON
fields.description: Error when sound_definitions.json contains JSON syntax errors. Check for missing commas, brackets, or malformed entries.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the JSON parse error message

fields.title: Loose Definition
fields.description: Warning when a sound definition references a path that doesn't follow the expected folder structure. Sounds should be organized in the sounds/ folder.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the path to the loose sound definition
